name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Senior Test Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I specialize in **test planning**, **test case design**, and **manual testing** within Agile and Scrum environments. Proficient in **Azure DevOps** and various **test management tools**, I ensure high-quality software delivery through rigorous **defect tracking** and comprehensive computer system validation processes. My technical background as a Senior Python Full Stack Developer has equipped me with skills in **FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**, **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**, alongside cloud service expertise in **AWS** and **Azure**. This unique blend of testing and software development enhances my ability to contribute to enterprise-grade solutions in e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
- Conducted manual testing, ensuring thorough coverage of healthcare applications and Python microservices to validate functionality and performance.
- Developed comprehensive test plans and designed test cases for automated and manual testing using tools integrated with **Azure DevOps**.
- Managed defect tracking processes to maintain high-quality standards in accordance with Agile and Scrum methodologies, improving release cycles by **30%**.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams of developers and product owners to ensure test case designs effectively addressed user stories and acceptance criteria.
- Ensured computer system validation protocols are met through rigorous testing procedures, maintaining compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and SOC 2.
- Implemented test management tools for documenting and tracking tests and results, leading to improved test coverage and defect identification by **25%**.
- Designed and executed validation strategies for **cloud-native** applications, leveraging experience with **Azure** services to align testing with deployment workflows.
- Participated in Agile ceremonies, promoting continuous integration and delivery of features using **CI/CD pipelines** on platforms like **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**.
- Actively contributed to improving testing processes and toolsets by mentoring junior engineers in best practices for test case design and execution.
- Supported coverage of multiple environments by configuring quality assurance processes, ensuring seamless integration between **Azure**, **Kubernetes**, and Python deployments.
- Championed the enhancement of testing efficiency through the adoption of automated testing frameworks and tools **(e.g., PyTest, Selenium)**, resulting in **40% faster** test cycles.
- Executed test case scenarios focused on ensuring the reliability and performance of healthcare experiences, contributing to regulatory compliance and improving user satisfaction ratings by **20%**.

- Developed comprehensive **test plans** and **test cases** for validating backend services, ensuring robust performance through methodologies such as **Agile** and **Scrum**.
- Conducted **manual testing** for APIs and microservices built using **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), enhancing overall product quality by identifying defects early in the development lifecycle.
- Collaborated with development teams to ensure **defect tracking** and management through tools like **Azure DevOps**, improving resolution timelines by **30%**.
- Designed and executed **computer system validation** processes, ensuring compliance with financial regulations and enhancing overall software assurance.
- Utilized various **test management tools** to maintain organized records of testing efforts and progress towards meeting milestones.
- Improved testing efficiency by implementing automated tests in **Python**, integrating with CI/CD pipelines via **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions**.
- Conducted real-time **test case design** for RESTful and gRPC APIs, optimizing performance validation frameworks for high-throughput financial applications.
- Engaged in continuous feedback cycles with cross-functional teams to iterate on **test plans** and enhance clarity in the **Agile** framework, promoting team alignment.
- Leveraged insights from **computer software assurance** practices to refine testing strategies, resulting in a **20%** reduction in post-release defects.
- Championed best practices for **defect tracking**, ensuring all issues were logged in a consistent manner, facilitating effective communication with stakeholders across teams.
- Trained junior team members on comprehensive testing techniques and effective use of **test management tools**, fostering a culture of quality within the organization.

- Developed and executed detailed **test plans** to ensure comprehensive coverage of system functionalities, aligning with **Agile** methodologies and best practices.
- Designed effective **test cases** for manual testing, focusing on core functionalities to support the overall system validation process while leveraging **defect tracking tools** to document issues.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Azure DevOps** to streamline test management and track progress, improving team efficiency by **20%**.
- Executed rigorous manual tests across various modules in compliance with **computer software assurance** standards, contributing to a **30%** reduction in production defects during quarterly releases.
- Conducted continuous **defect tracking** and reporting, ensuring timely resolution of all discovered issues to enhance product reliability.
- Led weekly status meetings to facilitate communication among team members and ensure alignment on testing objectives within the **Scrum** framework.
- Assisted in the validation of critical computer systems using structured methodologies to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulatory requirements.
- Participated in **Agile** ceremonies (sprint planning, reviews) to align testing strategies with project goals, promoting a proactive approach to quality assurance.
- Implemented improvements in **test management tools** workflows, enhancing visibility and traceability of test results and defect information.
- Fostered a culture of quality by mentoring junior team members in **test case design** and best practices in manual testing, contributing to team skill development.
- Contributed to the **Azure DevOps** configuration to automate aspects of the testing process, resulting in a **15%** increase in test execution efficiency.
- Supported build validation processes through manual and automated testing, ensuring the seamless integration of new features into the existing codebase and maintaining software reliability.
